briefTitle: A Study of Baricitinib (LY3009104) in Patients With Moderate to Severe Atopic Dermatitis
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Baricitinib in Adult Patients With Moderate to Severe Atopic Dermatitis

arms.label: 4 mg Baricitinib Maximum Extended Enrollment Cohort
2 mg Baricitinib Maximum Extended Enrollment Cohort
1 mg Baricitinib Maximum Extended Enrollment Cohort

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of baricitinib as monotherapy in participants with moderate to severe atopic dermatitis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Investigator's Global Assessment (IGA) of 0 or 1 With a â‰¥ 2 Point Improvement (Placebo, 2 mg, or 4 mg Baricitinib)
